original_title: Louise et la légende du serpent à plumes
overview: 10-year-old Louise has just moved to Mexico. When her lizard, Kéza, escapes, Louise goes looking for him and meets Arturo. Along with Luchador Diego, they pursue Kéza and allow him to be reincarnated as the Mexican God, Quetzalcoatl.
title: Louise et la légende du serpent à plumes
